properties.text: You wake up. In a neglected dwelling. At first, you think it's a dream. But when you touch the edge of your bed, you realise: it is no dream. It is pure reality.You see the dark atmosphere around you. The windows in your room are black, and you can't see outside. You don't know where you are. Slowly, you stand up.

look_under_bed: You try to look under the Bed.
sleep_in_bed: You are tired. You lie in the bed.

look_trough_window: You try to look trough the Window.
open_window: You try to open the Window.
